message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $12000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $15000. This is an opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive price. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.
